channel.title: HELP! this is my first time making a server and client
channel.description: can anyone give me an easy client and whatever else so i can have my own server, i need something easy that wont mess up and i want it to be port 43594 if possible please, any help would be great, and i HAVE looked for them on here and havent found crap

item.title: HELP! this is my first time making a server and client
item.dc:creator: @Dragon99999 Dragon99999
item.description:
@Dragon99999 wrote:

Try:
Moparscape 3.2 with Aryan - http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html
Testscape - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VC3TV8XY

If you have XP and JDK, use this compiler:

@echo off
title Compile
cls
"%programfiles%\Java\Jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause

Change the _02 to whatever version your JDK is

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! this is my first time making a server and client
